name: unglued
content:
come unglued
Add to word list
Add to word list
to experience difficulties and fail: When the secret plans came unglued, the president was revealed to have ordered the burglary.
to lose control of your emotions or behaviour and become very angry: It was reported that she "came unglued" when she heard of his refusal to cooperate.
